definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: twenty years of age, wore tight mini skirts and low cut blouses. She would
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢穿紧身的低胸t_shirt以及迷你短裙。

sentences.english: The tight shirt rides up out of the trousers when I sit down.
sentences.chinese: 我一坐下这件紧身衬衫就从裤子里跑到上面来了。

sentences.english: Feet clattering, black tights, skirts just short of sin.
sentences.chinese: 嘈杂的脚步声，黑色的紧身衣，造孽的短裙。

sentences.english: It may be used for reference in developing new kind of steel and enhancing the elastic strength of autofrettage tubes.
sentences.chinese: 这对研制新钢材，提高自紧身管弹性强度等可供借鉴。

sentences.english: Rumbold. Mrs. Rumbold was a large, unsmiling lady in a tight black dress.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个很高大，严肃的穿着紧身黑裙子的夫人。

sentences.english: There's plenty of video onlineof women in silver bodysuits.
sentences.chinese: 网上有很多穿着银色紧身衣的女人的视频。

sentences.english: She'sdressed in a floaty white skirt and a cotton print camisole.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条翩翩白裙和印花布紧身衣。

sentences.english: You look so elegant in that tight dress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿那件紧身洋装看起来好高雅。

sentences.english: She handed me a pair of rainbow tights with gold sparkles.
sentences.chinese: 她递给我一套闪着金光的彩虹纹紧身衣。

sentences.english: A womans costume with a tight bodice and an overskirt drawn back to reveal a colorful underskirt .
sentences.chinese: 一种由紧身衣和展示多彩的罩裙构成的女服。

sentences.english: They aren't ready to pick until I have to start wearing tights again.
sentences.chinese: 一直到我开始穿紧身衣裤时才可以采摘苹果了。

sentences.english: I 'd already sewn my dress and my tights to thepiece of material.
sentences.chinese: 我已经把我的衣服以及我的紧身衣和线缝到一起去了。

sentences.english: He'd come to work dressed in skin-tight black clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他会穿着紧身黑衣去上班。

sentences.english: She wore skintight jeans and a white sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着紧身牛仔裤和白色毛衣。

sentences.english: He wore a skintight black and yellow outfit covered with advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特身穿黄黑相间的紧身外衣，上面印有广告。

sentences.english: Do not wear jeans that are too tight or too baggy.
sentences.chinese: 千万别穿太紧身或者太松垮的仔裤。

definition: old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
